content: Issues like https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/58850 don't track something actionable or resolvable. Should we use the pinning feature of github or at least have a special tag just for these kind of "no discussion issues"?
you can have max 4 pinned issues I think
I'd prefer to keep pinned issues for "hey, today's nightly is horribly broken, don't open the 42nd issue about it"
Maybe we allocate a label for these types of "landing pad" issues?
